data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Hajjah to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hajjah, Yemen
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 373 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4777 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,778,463 who are far from you in Hajjah, Yemen from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,781,626 lost in Hajjah that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Northern Yemeni people.
Lord we pray you unite the 373 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Hajjah.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Hajjah.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 373 believers in Hajjah and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
